biotools.summary: The Jnet algorithm provides a three-state (α-helix, β-strand and coil) prediction of secondary structure. Given either a single protein sequence or a multiple sequence alignment, this tool derives alignment profiles from which predictions of secondary structure and solvent accessibility are made.

bioschemas.name: Jpred WS (jabaws)
bioschemas.summary: The Jnet algorithm provides a three-state (α-helix, β-strand and coil) prediction of secondary structure.
